website_summaries.verdict: A best pick for a classic leather version that's well made.
pros: Owners love the quality leather, beautiful construction, and overall look and feel of this jacket
Most felt it ran true to size
It also stands out for being warm and having easy-to-reach pockets
cons: A few said the jacket was wrinkled upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great look, and feels right
customer_reviews.text: Great look, and feels right!!! It's an honor to wear something similar to the ones that wore the real thing, fighting for their country back in WWII. I love that generation, alongside the ones who fought before and after for our freedom.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love this Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a close fitting quality black leather jacket. This fit the bill perfectly. I am 6', 180 lbs, athletic build. A medium fit perfectly. If you watch old reruns of Hogan's Heroes, it is Col Hogan's jacket. I really like the liner with the 48 star American flag. Some complained about the leather smell but I think it is typical of any new leather jacket. It is certainly not a strong smell. Since it's leather and therefore a good windbreaker, I find it comfortable down to the mid 30s. Highly recommended. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: An almost perfect jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: this jacket fits very well as an X-Large. The insulation is good but this is not meant for freezing temps unless you add a heavy shirt or sweater. It has a very handsome look to it. Quite comfortable. Dislikes: in my non-expert opinion, this is pleather, not leather. I think you can see that pretty quickly if you have experience with pleather goods. Although I expected a leather jacket, I will keep this as a vegan substitute. I will admit it had people guessing.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Chas Lokich

customer_reviews.title: A fun useful jacket, at a fair price, what's not to love.
customer_reviews.text: If you are expecting a leather jacket with thick leather like the old original jackets you will be disappointed in this one. This jacket is made in China, not in the USA. The price is reflective of being produced in China. If you want a decent, warm, attractive jacket, this one may work for you. I purchased this jacket to use as a knock around jacket to wear with jeans. Overall considering the price, leather texture, quality, functionality of the product, I believe I'll enjoy this jacket. ($159.00 vs $700.00 - $800.00) A fun useful jacket, at a fair price, what's not to love.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Fancy name on poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight inexpensive jacket. The YKK zipper is wussy, not very good. Total weight including packaging is <4#. I'm going to keep it but overall dissatisfied. Typical Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: Threads coming loose already
customer_reviews.text: I am debating whether or not to return this coat. I love the way it looks and I got very cheap on sale but I have only had it a couple weeks and some of the threads are already coming undone on the collar. Beautiful coat for the money but not durable at all considering I have only worn it doing stuff like driving and shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Talk Development

customer_reviews.title: USAF Chief Master Sargeant ret. Bomber
customer_reviews.text: Made well. Smells good, looks good. Feels good. A gift I was proud to give to my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anne Backschies

customer_reviews.title: Sizing a Problem for a Quality Leather Jacket.
customer_reviews.text: The Landing Leathers Air Force A-2 Leather Bomber Jacket appears well made with quality leather. Looked like leather, felt like leather, smelled like leather unlike a few critical reviews I read. I liked the look of the jacket. Unfortunately it did not fit and I am returning it. I normally wear a size 44 which they call a large. The fit was fine across the shoulders, waist and sleeves. Unfortunately it was way too snug across the chest. You could see the outline of the pen in my shirt pocket through the chest of the jacket. Sadly XL is not available and will not be available for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Heygar

customer_reviews.title: long lasting quality, great value for $$ spent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my husband a little over 2 years ago, to replace a nearly identical one, that was used every cold weather season, for the prior 23 years. The old jacket still has many years of utility left in it, but it also has quite a collection of scuff marks. As fond of the old jacket as he is, I wanted him to have a new one. Both leather jackets have very similar construction, so I expected this one to hold up as well... and it has, so far. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Quality you can see and feel, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Taking this jacket out of the box, you can feel the quality in the weight of the material and just by looking. You can feel the sturdiness and just outright quality. Holds up well against elements, several marks I've seen just rub right off. **Take the time to measure yourself before you buy stuff online.** I did, ordered the correct size, and for me it fits perfectly and feels great. Very good at insulating in cold weather conditions plus wind. Very satisfied with this purchase!! October 2020 edit: still holding up extremely well in quality. Take care of this jacket and it’ll take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when wearing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubby on Father's Day. It looks great on him and fits him well. He loves it as well. Unfortunately we live in the south and it is too warm for him to wear it right now so he will have to wait until closer towards the end of the year to get use out of it. He is looking forward to wearing it. It fits him perfectly at this time, and he is trying to lose weight so I hope it won't be too big for him by the time he is able to wear it. Bottom line great looking jacket good price, I bought while on a small sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am completely amazed at this jacket. First, don't expect a vintage bomber jacket. This however is a really made jacket that has all the cool features the old WW2 jackets had. I actually prefer this jacket over my 400 dollar one. Guess that one will spend some time in the closet. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Soronen

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large based on the size guide. The jacket fits, but the sleeves are a bit on the short side if I put my arms straight out in front of me as if driving a car. The jacket is also available in a LT (large-tall) with an extra inch of length in the sleeve. Unfortunately, there is a $120 price difference between the L and LT. Other than the fit in the sleeves, it's a very nice jacket.
customer_reviews.author: dscabra

customer_reviews.title: Landing Leather Men's Airforce A-2 Leather Flight Bomber Jacket XL
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 5 stars because it is and elegant well made bomber jacket and it does run true size. I purchased this product and had to return it only because XL was really XL, normally I wear size Large but just about everything I purchased through Amazon.com in clothing has arrived smaller than my true Large size so I ordered this one in XL. It was disappointing because it is such a nice jacket and when I returned the XL to get the Large, it was no longer available. If you are looking for a nice bomber jacket......this is one you may want to consider.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Leather Reproduction Bomber Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a new leather jacket to replace my well worn friend but didn't want to spend hundreds and hundreds of dollars on a new one. When I found this coat on Amazon I really looked the look and the price and decided to give myself an early Xmas present. I LOVE this jacket. Fit is great, very nice styling and the quality is very nice especially considering the price. Warm without being overly heavy. I'm very pleased with the purchase and recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: However for the money it is a great product. Very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Yes the leather coat is made in China. However for the money it is a great product. Very happy with the quality. The leather is soft, inside keeps you warm and dry. Nothing to complain about. Do yourself a favor get the next size up. If you are a Large, get the X-Large for a better fit. If you want American made and Amaerican quality be perpared to shell out 3X as much money. You get a good quality jacket at a great price. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: William B. Dulmage

customer_reviews.title: it is a good purchase. However
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it is a good purchase.However: Made in China and the leather is thin, and not good for motorcyclists. The stitching is okay, but not exceptional. Being 6'4", I ordered and received a 'tall' that was approximately 3/4" shorter than what a normal "tall" should be.Over all, it is comfortable and worth the price for a casual jacket.
customer_reviews.author: W.F. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, looks good
customer_reviews.text: My jacket was made in China. The workmanship is great, stitches are smooth and even. The leather is heavy, soft and supple, the color match of the individual leather pieces where sewn together is phenomenal! IMO, after reading the other reviews, I opted to order one size larger. (I am 6 foot one, 250 pounds, broad shoulders.) The size 3X gives me the shoulder room I need. I have received many compliments on this flight jacket from other pilot friends, and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dunakey

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 2X, my usual size, from another company using their size chart but the jacket was too small in the body so I returned it to buy this jacket. I have to say the jacket arrived much faster than stated. It is a heavy weight, smells like leather, appears to be constructed well. I ordered this jacket as a 3X, didn’t want to return it like the other, it is bigger in the body but I can live with it. Definitely recommend this leather jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Jensen

customer_reviews.title: It stinks....literally!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket with a bit of concern because the price was so reasonable. I guess it's true - you really do get what you pay for. When I opened this package the smell; I think from the black dye, was so powerful the jacket was un-wearable. I've had it airing out for 3 weeks now and still can't wear it. It almost smells like turpentine. I also tried leather jacket conditioner, but that didn't help at all. I guess It's going in the trash. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great replica bomber style jacket. It fits perfectly, it's a very comfortable jacket and pretty darned warm. It appears to be well made, as in stitching, etc. I used to have a much bigger budget for clothing and have always loved leather coats and jackets. I used to pretty much exclusively shop at Wilson's and it usually took me quite a while to find a jacket that was just right. You get more than what you pay for IMHO. Great jacket, great price.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. HURLEY

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Liking this jacket more every day. I'm 5'10" and 170 lbs. and sort of between a medium and a large in most coats. I bought the medium, following online advice I found to always buy a snug fit in a leather jacket as it will stretch as your break it in. It's working out perfectly and fits better every day. It's good quality leather, looks nice, and has a great lining backed with some fiberfill. It's warm enough for Alabama weather, that is, temperatures not less than freezing most of the time. One word of warning: Don't buy this if you're expecting a lightweight jacket as this is quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very, very happy with this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying an extra large, normally all the shirts I buy are large! Yes, I tried this jacket on but I was only wearing a T-shirt! Thought it was a little loose, I put a sweater on, and bingo, perfect fit! I am 100% satisfied with this jacket, now the next step is put my military patches on it!
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a leather bomber since there were 48 stars on the flag. Now this one has a flag on the inside with 48 stars. The jacket is very well made. It fits as expected. If anyone decides to purchase one be sure to measure yourself and go by the sizeing chart and you will get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: MTS II

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and FLAKING Leather!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket lasted 1 year before falling apart. We've kept it as a "soare" but the "leather" has so badly flaked off and that happened within the first year. It is junk...do NOT BUY it if you are looking for GOOD QUALITY!!! Sorry this review took so long...life gets in the way!
customer_reviews.author: Bonny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice with historical gaffe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice jacket I bought for my son and is comparable to a jacket I bought at a mall leather store for $160 back in 1990. Just one observation was that the tag says "Air Force" and the ad boasts of the WW2 American flag. There was no US Air Force in WW2. It was the US Army Air Corp.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish fit.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it, like others have stated it came in shrunk wrapped bag and was wrinkled alitte bit... but after shaking it out and one wearing of it then the wrinkles are gone. I'm a big guy, 6ft and 260 plus, it's a little loose in the chest.. but I like it that way so I can wear a sweater underneath if needed. Great feel to it perfect fit otherwise. It's not a full leather jacket..but a combo of leather and suede.. I don't know if it's been treated to be water resistant... if not then I recommend that you get treated. Overall it's a great jacket better then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great jacket
customer_reviews.text: my husband & I love this jacket. my husband has a tummy and needs extra room in his jackets without ordering something too big. this jackets waist band and wrist bands fit perfect as well as shoulders. the tummy area has a lot of extra room. almost too much. it is good leather and lining is good. I am such it will keep him warm in cold weather also. we are happy to find this at such an affordable price also.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.Bommarito

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Bomber Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a Christmas gift last year. I'd had many family members try to replace my aging leather bomber jacket that I'd had for years, but nothing felt like the old one. Nothing had the range of movement that it had, the warmth, the suppleness....except for this jacket. This is the kind of jacket that doesn't get in your way. It doesn't feel bulky, but it keeps the wind at bay. This isn't the jacket that's going to get you on the cover of GQ magazine, but really, those kind of jackets are going to let you freeze when you really need them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking what more could you ask for
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable coat, replaced one I use to wear riding my motorcycle. Not sure would trust this for that, but I don't ride anymore so it's fine with me. Lining is comfy sizing is ok. I'm 6'1" 255 with gut not muscle. Ordered xxlt and it fit snug may be getting time for me to consider xxx just not there yet. Price was twice my other jacket, but that was 10 years ago,
customer_reviews.author: jimkata2000

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and excellent quality - make sure of size because this is definitely small
customer_reviews.text: This runs true to size but definitely consider getting the larger one if you are active. This fit fantastically for my husband but was much too tight for him to really do much movement in. The seller was very nice in returning and we purchased a medium which was great. Please note there is a great variety in colors with these if you want to match two together it will be difficult. This small was a beautiful brown and the medium we received was almost black. They are very well made and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: ... wear it today for the first time it getting cool out here in October/Massachusetts
customer_reviews.text: I did wear it today for the first time it getting cool out here in October/Massachusetts ..I got Two compliments already..This Bomber Jacket is Awesome-Heavy and beautifully made ...Fits like it supposed to....I had my own Mens Clothing Stores back in the time and completely know about quality...This is a great Christmas Gift!!...I love this Bomber Jacket!! ....Highly Recommended ....Unique Critique....Sharon, Mass....PS ....Thank You Amazon as Well.
customer_reviews.author: UniqueCritique

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Flight Jacket For the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good flight jacket for the money. Exactly like my old USMC issue leather flight jacket, but improved, with a pair of slit "hand-warmer" pockets behind the snap-closure cargo pockets. Good quality leather. Good workmanship. Fits well. Wish the label didn't say Air Force, but its a good value anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great bomber style leather jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Love this leather bomber style jacket. Not too heavy and not too light. Priced right too. Arrived in good condition - not folded creating creases which was nice. Fits great and looks great. Get compliments on it but that might be due to how much more awesome it makes me look. Don't hesitate to buy if looking for a reasonably priced bomber style leather jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of weeks ago in XL and I love it. It was slightly roomy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Navy G-1 from this company a couple of weeks ago in XL and I love it. It was slightly roomy, but I loved the jacket and ordered this Air Force A-2 in a Large Tall size in black. It fits a little more snug and it'll be my go to jacket when I'm wearing just a t shirt or a light shirt underneath. I'll wear the XL when I'm wearing a sweater or hoodie underneath on the colder days. They're both great jackets! If you buy, I promise you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Walden

customer_reviews.title: Landing Leathers jacket
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy with this jacket..Tightly packaged and many wrinkles hard to smooth out. Rough finish. I bought a Landing Leathers jacket that is not the Air Force model and it is great. I thought this one would have the same quality. Too much trouble to send anything back so I kept it. Don't wear it much.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Maestas

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is well made and closely resembles the Air Force jacket except it is a darker brown. I selected the distressed model and the leather looks weathered as expected. It is not discolored like many other distressed jackets are, so if that is your expectation the weathered jacket is a uniformly shaded dark brown. The zipper and snaps work effectively and the detail to authenticity is very good. I am pleased with this selection.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I saw mixed reviews on this jacket and decided to take a chance. No regrets at all with just one small thing. The cuffs on the sleeves are pilling up just a little after 3 weeks of wear. Otherwise, it's a great fit and the leather is just about right in weight. Planning to add a couple of patches to make it look more authentic as a pilot's jacket. Got my fingers crossed I don't mess it up.
customer_reviews.author: SeamusZHarper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket, Nice price......
customer_reviews.text: Wow... nice jacket, nice price..... very good quality tailoring...and generously cut..... I read the reviews and they are accurate... I have a thick chest and broad shoulders and I was a little nervous ordering a large since the jacket is made in China.... the jackets I have bought before run small and don't fit my chest.... but this jacket fits well and gives me room to move... 5 stars......
customer_reviews.author: rmarquez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and excellent leather
customer_reviews.text: I have searched the world over for a bomber/ flight jacket in 3xl made of quality leather (nothing wrong with lamb skin but it's to thin and light). It's not a cow hyde but on close to that scale for me. And the price was really excellent. Fits perfect and is nice and warm. It's not heavy but not light either. A perfect fit for a 6'2" 260lb man like me.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K. Mcdowell

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: This coat is a very good value. Leather is good quality, lining is nice also. I recommend ordering a size larger than you normally wear. I ordered a 2X, and I normally wear a XL. A bit loose fitting, but that is what I wanted so I could wear sweaters under it. Like the coat very much.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: but fit is very good. They sell another version with a better grade ...
customer_reviews.text: Leather feels a bit thinner than the same jacket I bought in Black, but fit is very good. They sell another version with a better grade of leather, but it is more than double the price, and some other sellers have a similar heavy cowhide leather for just a little more than this one costs.Have had a Landing Leathers jacket I bought 15 years ago or more, and it has held up well, just got too small, so I gave it to my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: forty

customer_reviews.title: but I am very happy with the jacket
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid of buying online, but I am very happy with the jacket. It is heavy, soft snd has a quality feel to it. And a wonderful leather smell. (My first night out in it happened to be a vegan bar. Oops!) My complaints are very minor. The hand warmer pockets are a bit farther back than I would like. It looks better but is less convenient. And the collar is a teensy bit higher than I like; it tends to brush against my neck. All in all, I can't imagine a better jacket for the money. Let's hope this one doesn't get stolen....
customer_reviews.author: JS22

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket, recommended to anyone looking for a bomber style jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well finished, good quality jacket. It fit me perfectly, the jacket is quite roomy and you should be able to wear a sweater or a fleece jacket inside. I would definitely recommend this jacket to anyone who's looking for a bomber style jacket. The quality of this jacket is excellent! I'd like to add that the jacket is very comfortable to wear and is quite warm, so it is suitable for colder weather. It rained here yesterday and I noticed that the jacket was repelling water, unlike some leather jackets that absorb water. So it seems this jacket is water resistant although I don't see that mentioned anywhere. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Random User

customer_reviews.title: NIce buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: The leather is butter smooth. The quality is good. There is one odd thing. I noticed along some of the seams small bits white fabric shows through. It is very obvious on a black leather jacket. It is clearly part of the lining because it could not be picked out. I took care of it by dabbing a black permanent marker on it. It was comfortable in 50 degree weather when I took the bike out of winter storage this week.
customer_reviews.author: runningman

customer_reviews.title: Landing Leathers Has A New Customer For Life
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is an outstanding addition to my cool weather gear. The fit was slightly more roomy than the sizing chart but still very comfortable. The leather is soft and pliable like a nice pair of kid gloves. The hardware (zipper & snaps) is all high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ginn

customer_reviews.title: A bit smelly
customer_reviews.text: It's more appealing on Amazon then it is in person depending on your style, it looked larger and more heavy duty on me than expected. Otherwise it's just as enjoyable as any other leather jacket. The new leather smell is quite strong however, be ready to deal with that. The smell spread to my other clothes, which is pretty annoying actually.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for casual or dress.
customer_reviews.text: I htried it on and wore it once and it is a class piece of outerwear. Fits great and looks great as well. I dont mind spending premium bucks for a top notch jacket. Im not worried about wearing the coat out as much as outgrowing it. Top notch worth every dollar. Terry Spurling
customer_reviews.author: Terry D Spurling

customer_reviews.title: Higly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this recently and received it with the week. Excellent fit! Pleasing leather smell, texture and feel. You can't go wrong with their size chart or this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Brandt Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Landing Leathers Men's Air Force A-2 Flight Leather Bomber Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. The buyer should be aware that the leather grade is "Genuine Leather". This grade is below Full Grain and Top Grain. That being said, it is still a decent jacket and constructed pretty well. I am a big guy and ordered XXLT and while it fits - I would order a size larger for a little extra roominess. I have received compliments on the jacket and it is a great value for $99. I expect it will last about 5-7 years for this grade of leather. I immediately used the best leather conditioner on it and the leather just soaked it up. Great looking jacket and warm for temps in the 30s.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking jacket
customer_reviews.text: The day after I received this jacket it got cold and a winter storm blew in dumping 2 inches of ice and 12 inches of snow on top of it. Plus I had tickets for a Styx/REO concert. I had to get out in it 3 times just to clear off the car. First in the sleet and rain. Then in the snow leaving the motel for the concert.and once again in the snow after the concert. It kept me warm and dry throughout. I received numerous compliment from friends as well as perfect strangers at the concert. You can't go wrong buying this jacket, excellent price and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: William V. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: All I need now is a white silk scarf
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear with my Civil Air Patrol corporate uniform and it is exactly as described in the regulation. It fits exactly as it should and makes me look even cooler than I thought it would. And the best part is that I could afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn B. Knight

customer_reviews.title: this was a great buy. Leather is soft
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was a great buy. Leather is soft, even if not as soft as the $600 original, of course, great resistance to wear and tear. Take care of with with a good leather conditioner. Not super quiet - a bit of a squeaky sound when arms rub on the body-until it's broken in and conditioned. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: MaxM

customer_reviews.title: This was a birthday gift for my younger brother.  His 73rd
customer_reviews.text: Stan, my brother was so pleased and excited about this jacket. He had spent twenty years in the US Air Force and he told me that it was very close to the jackets they wore in the aircraft. He Loves it. I love it too as an outstanding gift.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Segal

customer_reviews.title: Use the fit guide!! Great Jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice jacket for the money. It's soft and it fits well, and has nice details. Most important thing to do is to measure your chest and use the fit chart. I wear a 46R so I purchased the 47" chest XL for the regular fit. It fits exactly how it should. Not too long, not too bulky. I have had jackets in the past say they are XL, but are either way tight, or way baggy. This one is neither of those. IF you use the chart with correct measurement, you should get a great fit. Would definitely purchase again. It came much faster than anticipated. Excellent job!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A steal at this price
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter in weight than my original hand me down 1950s era Air Force issue A2, but finish is much finer--stitching even throughout, good finish to leather, and luxuriant knit cuffs and waist trim will keep out any draft. Easily compares to jackets at 3x & 4x the price.
customer_reviews.author: EW1(SG)

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the good quality quality It is very warm and the sizing guide was accurate (at least in my case) the only reason I didn’t give it 5stars is the waist band is tight and when unzipped it looks like you are wearing a coat that’s too small I am hoping that will loosen up over time. I very much recommend this jacket
customer_reviews.author: Richard Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Solid Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this jacket to anyone. Great fit and quality material. You can feel the "weight" of the jacket and it is not something flimsy. Reminds me of days past in the USAF. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RRR

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket in the airline world
customer_reviews.text: As an airline pilot I always strive to find things that will last me through the years while on the job. This jacket has far exceeded my expectations. Quality is up to par of my airlines jacket which is around $400. I have sown on some epaulets, ordered a patch and no one will be able to tell I didn't purchase the more expensive one. All of he pilots at my work have completely fallen in love with it and I believe it won't be long until the entire airline buys these jackets. Awesome awesome awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Newport

customer_reviews.title: Fit like it said it would
customer_reviews.text: Quality looks good and it feels good. Tried a jacket from another company and nothing fit. This is great and I'm 100% pleased. Also, this didn't cost as much as the other one I tried. What a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really like the the coat at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really like the the coat at all, the sleeves wear way to short, pockets to far back on the sides, snaps on the collar didn't like that part at a all, also one on the zipper cover on top. I general wear a medium an that's what i order. An I'm a really small person an it didn't even come close to fiting me. So needless to say i won't ever buy another coat from them. I had read different reviews like this one, but it had been a while so i though they had been doing better but i guess not. So any way happy coat hunting good day.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best jacket I ever had! And the closest to an A-2 original jacket, the leather is really soft and not as thin as I thought it would be. I ordered mine in brown color, it looks however just a bit darker than in the picture. I usually do not buy clothes online that cost above the price of a t-shirt, as sometimes it just doesn't fits, sometimes I got a shirt too small or too big. But, the price for this jacket it's a real bargain to let it go, So I gave it a shot, I'm 5'7 high, I ordered medium size and it fits just great. I'm really happy with this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just would it would have specified that it was suede leather.. Softer then I expected! Thought it was going to be a little stiff. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit fast delivery as posted by vendor.
customer_reviews.text: The inside pocket was a little small other wise it would have been 5 star and it would have been nice if there was an insude pocket on the other side as well both should be zippered. Great lookin jacket. I was afraid a large would have been small as im in between a large an xl. Fit was perfect. I wear a 16 1/2 x 33 shirt for reference for some of you.
customer_reviews.author: shipmag

customer_reviews.title: Best deal i had in long time!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Just if you normally buy big and tall keep that in mind. This jacket is made very well. Shipping is fast. Just be sure you read size chart to confer your size. I ordered wrong but they made it up and returned and sent me proper jacket know proplem. Great seller and great price can't go wrong..
customer_reviews.author: VIRGIL GARNER

customer_reviews.title: A great real leather bomber jacket
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a compressed package. I ordered the brown color but got a black one. That's ok because it fits just right. Made in Kentucky using real leather quality. It keeps me warm when I go out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Walt Guimbellot

customer_reviews.title: This is the leather jacket for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a brown Landing Leathers C-2 Naval flight jacket with the fur collar that I love to wear to work during cold weather. I was looking for a black flight jacket to wear for social outings and motorcycle riding. Landing leathers jackets are quality construction and reasonably priced. I would buy from them again and recommend them to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: JerseySteve

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory, but........5
customer_reviews.text: Exterior pockets are small, would prefer larger ones. Only one small inside pocket, two larger ones would be better. Leather is very nice, and the workmanship is good. Should be very comfortable when broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Bilco41

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and provides just right amount of warmth. Like the waistband and sleeve knit elastic closures and the lining. Natural leather, so it breathes and not sweat like in a synthetic leather jacket. Bought three more as gifts for my boys.
customer_reviews.author: Goustie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. It fits him well. I wanted to replace a jacket he had worn for 25 years and wore holes through. This seems to be a nice weight and durable. He said it is as comfortable as his old one. Which I quickly got rid of
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Musty Smell
customer_reviews.text: At this price point, I didn't expect to receive a $500 jacket, but I was pleasantly surprised to find that it was very attractive, fit well and appeared to be well made. Unfortunately, I noticed a very musty smell on this item when I first opened the package. It smelled like it had been stored in a damp warehouse or cargo container for weeks. I hung it up near a heat vent overnight, hoping that it would air out, but that didn't seem to make any difference. I returned the jacket the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Owl Creek Observer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bomber jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, well made. Good value for the price. It is a dress jacket that gets compliments. The leather is good quality but is not thick, therefore it should not be used for heavy duty work,or hunting or other things that a bomber jacket doesn't seem well suited to. It is warm and comfortable but does not overheat you.The liner is very nice and pretty cool nostalgia wise. You could easily stitch an organization patch or name tag velcro patch to this and it would look good. My jacket ran to size very well.
customer_reviews.author: CS in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: My sons love these jackets
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Christmas for my twin 18 year-old sons are who are working on their private pilot licenses. They love these jackets. My sons are very slim so the small is a little loose on them but gives them room to grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and i see no quality issues except it is heavier than I expected. The fit is probably as good as possible but a little long for me. Lining is beautiful but the leather is not as soft as I expected. Still it is a great buy and I will enjoy wearing it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Brittjr

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this jacket. Some negative reviewers don't understand what a true lining is. This jacket has an uninsulated "lining" in the body of the coat. There is no Thinsulate or such. Still, the jacket is plenty warm, and the leather smells just right. Great purchase; would buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Jacket! I Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good quality, especially for the price. Looks great, a very good bargain. People complain of smell (?). Mine reeks of sexy leather. A good thing. I have 4 other leather jackets. So I didn’t need an off-the-charts bomber jacket. But if I did, it would cost $600-$750! Your typical $300 jacket is good, but it’s not what I ended up with. This jacket fits, looks, feels great, at a bargain price! Works for me and apparently a lot of guys out there.
customer_reviews.author: Walt from Mesa, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for one from the past.
customer_reviews.text: As a former Air Force pilot, I missed the jacket. This is not the quality of the one issued by the Air Force, but for this price, it is a good value and will serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert29

customer_reviews.title: Dad approved!
customer_reviews.text: For this fire my dad for Christmas. He's the quiet type, doesn't show emotion, rarely ever cracks a smile but he actually seemed impressed with this jacket and wore it out to dinner a few nights later. Looked good on him and the quality was obvious.
customer_reviews.author: MommyToKinsi

customer_reviews.title: Great look, good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I’m about 6’ 185 and the Large regular length jacket is absolutely perfect. The leather is great for the price and the look is awesome. Highly recommend the distressed leather look. Fit is as expected, I checked the sizing chart and it seems very accurate. The chest is big enough for a little wiggle room and it fits great with a sweater underneath. Warm enough for the New York City winter as long you’ve got layers.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Donovan

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice coat for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice coat for the money. It is not really small but I thought an extra large would have a little more room to wear heavier clothes under it. I would suggest going a size larger than usual if you want more movement freedom. Overall I am very satisfied with the workmanship and materials. It is not soft leather but not too stiff and rough either.
customer_reviews.author: zooman

customer_reviews.title: Hey, good-looking
customer_reviews.text: Truth be told, I bought this for motorcycling after my last leather jacket paid the ultimate price and saved my skin. But now that I've got it, I wear it everywhere. It gets compliments from men and ladies alike, including "Boy you sure can drink," "Are you going to pay for that?", and "Hey, come back here with my purse!" And that was all in one night. I think my next purchase will be the black version, so I can show up in the same bar again. I miss that place.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket, very nice price
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. It was a little shiny at first, but about an hour of GENTLE use of a green Scotch-brite pad took care of the shine (use care to not remove the color--unless that's what you're going for). It's well constructed, warm, stylish (in my opinion), and fun to wear. I've received quite a few compliments on it. I did have to explain to one admirer that it is a WWII replica, which is why the flag in the lining only has 48 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Emptor

customer_reviews.title: Fit was as expected. Quality seems good.
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars so far. The fit is as expected. My previous leather jacket was also a Medium and the fit is essentially the same. Construction appears to be good. I'll update the review periodically as the jacket becomes 'worn in'.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: Really like the jacket but the distressed brown looks almost black.
customer_reviews.author: Arlen F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what some of these folks expect from a leather jacket, especially at this price. I looked around locally and couldn't find anything this nice or in the right size without spending well over $500. The local Wilson outlet had jackets that pale in comparison. This jacket is well made, with soft, evenly tanned leather. Quality stitching and soft comfortable liner. I would agree that for us tall folks, the XLT could have a little longer sleeves, but I am kind of used to that by now. If you are looking for a nice leather jacket of this style and don't want to spend a lot, this is a great buy and a safe bet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Miller

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a new leather jacket in 20 years. This one was just what I was looking for. The look and fit are perfect. It missed 5 stars solely because the front flap pockets are just a bit shallower than I would have preferred. Otherwise this is a great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Duke M out

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Lots of belly room for those of us who have let that get out of control. I typically order large shirts for the belly. I got this as a gift in medium and it still fits great. It is a darker shade of brown than expected.
customer_reviews.author: SeaStone

customer_reviews.title: XXL is XL
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine jacket. The leather is excellent quality and the style authentic. It comes packed very well with it's own hanger which I find thoughtful. It is superb value for the dollar. However if you've got a gut like me, the jacket will bulge in front. XXL in this style fits like XL in other style leather jackets. The reason I haven't returned it is because I'm losing weight. By the time Falls comes around this year, the gut will be a lot smaller. I intend to look pretty good in this jacket by then.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous flight jacket
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous jacket. Well made and perfect fit. Always get compliments when I wear it. Easy to spend twice the money, I know. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: tkmars

customer_reviews.title: excellent jacket
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable ans stylish. I ordered a larger size based on other reviews. In retrospect, I would have to say that it is fairly true to size. I would order one size smaller if I had to do it over again. So I recommend ordering your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the coat
customer_reviews.text: I am right between a large and X large and was worried the X large would be too big. But the X large turned out to be just right. I'd say that the sizing tends to be slightly smaller so if you're between sizes go for the larger size. Very pleased with the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Reppert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful jacket! Worth waiting for!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a "real" leather flight jacket for many years and this one was well worth the wait. As noted by other reviews, the jacket appears to be of excellent quality, nicely stitched seams, well set pockets - overall, an outstanding value and perfect for our mild Oklahoma winter weather. At six feet, 210 lbs. and yes, a bit of a belly, this Large jacket fit perfectly, even reaching comfortably around my gut, which has been fading, as I've lost a little over 40 lbs. the past year. I'm sure this jacket will fit even better with another 20 lbs. gone from around my mid-section.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Vet

customer_reviews.title: Use what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful jacket. Just what I expected. It's warm and heavy though. Its meant for fall or winter. It's heavily lined.
customer_reviews.author: Demetria Mendivil

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely no way no how this is a leather jacket. It looks, feels and wears horrible. If you knows a bit about leather, you're going to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good buy for a superior jacket
customer_reviews.text: My son was delighted to have such a nice jacket. The leather was superior and the details very nice... not as heavy as some other leather jackets I have worn but with a good liner and useable in all conditions into Spring....really impressed for the price! I will buy this again to replace my own jacket soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Initial impressions all good!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a nice jacket. Good weight, good materials. Not too thin, not too thick. I will say that my first "oops" with the jacket was sangging the sleeve on a sharp protruding metal door lock recess. I was afraid it would have scuffed the leather. No mark whatsoever.... so that passes the first durability test. Nice jacket, good price. Great Service from seller. Had initally ordered the jacket in black, but changed my mind. I sent amessage to the seller: Luxury Lane, and they responded promptly, made the chage and sent the jacket in brown as I requested. Very good packaging too. Durable box, Jacket pressed flat, sealed in plastic. Would do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Palmetto Republic

customer_reviews.title: Not a leather coat
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a leather bomber jacket. The coat was made of a synthetic material not leather. It was, however, well made but not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: jws

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket at a great price! Fit is perfect, I did order it a size larger then I normally take, and I'm glad I did. We just had an ice storm the day after I received the jacket and it was very warm and comfortable. Great looking and already received a number of compliments when wearing it. The leather is a little supple and I am hopping it gets that wonderful worn look done the road but I may be disappointed on that. The trade being comfort over endurance. I find that stiffer harder leather ages better. Still a great jacket at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.Dearen

customer_reviews.title: I really like the jacket
customer_reviews.text: I really like the jacket. I will use it in my reinactments and Hanger Dances. I am debating if I want to paint a Nose Art of the P-51 on the back. "Cadillac of the Skies". I like the epelettes on the shoulders. They will be sporting Captains bars for the up coming WWII hanger dance here in Fort Worth. The jacket will do well.
customer_reviews.author: hobietacker

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket...great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket. It's comfortable, warm, and looks good. it also fits just right; I am 5'6" and 160 pounds and the large fits perfectly. This jacket definitely falls into the casual category which for me means I can wear it just about everywhere. For about 100 bucks, this jacket is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

product_meta.title: Landing Leathers Men's Air Force A-2 Leather Flight Bomber Jacket (Regular and Big & Tall)
product_meta.description: This flight jacket made to the same unyielding standards as the authentic A-2 military version. Soft lamb touch supple nappa is sewn with a dual entry pockets, plus ribbed cuffs and hem to snug in warmth. Imprinted WWII U.S flag lining.
feature_bullets: Shell: 100% leather; Body Lining: 75% polyester and 25% cotton; Sleeve Lining: 100% polyester; Filling: 100% polyester; Rib: 100% acrylic
Regular Fit: extra room through the chest and waist for a classic fit
Snap storm flap over front YKK zipper; Box stitched shoulder epaulet
Two dual entry pockets; Interior pocket; Ribbed cuffs and hem to snug in warmth
Imprinted WWII U.S flag lining; Insulated with polyester fill
